meanings.definition: A tube used for drawing or sketching.
meanings.sent1: I used a drawtubes to create a beautiful picture in art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist always carries drawtubes of different sizes in their bag.
meanings.sent3: The drawtubes rolled off the table and left a trail of paint behind.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of colorful drawtubes, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The drawtubes danced across the canvas, bringing the painting to life.

meanings.definition: Tubes used for drawing blood samples.
meanings.sent1: The nurse carefully labeled each drawtubes after collecting blood samples.
meanings.sent2: The hospital always keeps a stock of drawtubes for medical tests.
meanings.sent3: The drawtubes in the lab seemed to have a mind of their own, jumping around.
meanings.sent4: His veins were like drawtubes, carrying the life force through his body.
meanings.sent5: The drawtubes filled with blood, ready to reveal the secrets within.

meanings.definition: Tubes used for drawing liquid or gas into a container.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used drawtubes to transfer the liquid from one beaker to another.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic relied on drawtubes to extract oil from the engine.
meanings.sent3: The drawtubes bubbled with excitement as they filled the container.
meanings.sent4: The drawtubes acted like straws, sucking up every drop of liquid in their path.
meanings.sent5: The drawtubes hummed as they worked, pulling in the precious liquid.
